title: Provides statistical tools for the analysis of vector-borne diseases in Colombia
text: epiCo provides functions clustering, regression, now casting, sup reporting analyses vector-borne diseases Colombia. R common health information systems.

title: Provides statistical tools for the analysis of vector-borne diseases in Colombia
text: can install development version epiCo GitHub :

title: Provides statistical tools for the analysis of vector-borne diseases in Colombia
code: library(epiCo) library(incidence) library(qcc)  ## Occupation labels  isco_codes <- c(7321, 2411, 4121, 3439, 3431) isco_labels <- get_occupationLabels(isco_codes, output_level = "unit_label")  ## Incidence rates estimation  data("dengue_orinoquia_2017") incidence_object <- incidence(dengue_orinoquia_2017$FEC_NOT, groups = dengue_orinoquia_2017$COD_MUN_O, interval = "1 week") incidenceRate_object <- estimate_incidenceRate(incidence_object, level = 2)  ## Outbreaks detection  # EWMA method  incidence_arauca <- incidence_object$counts[,"81001"] outbreaks_object <- detect_outbreaks_EWMA(incidence_arauca, lambda = 0.2, nsigmas = 2)

title: Provides statistical tools for the analysis of vector-borne diseases in Colombia
